name: andyk
text: A comment left by andyk was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, michellemarie, the_dingle, luckypyjamas, thedudeabides85, Shinkicka)

name: blastradius
text: he also chews his nails. what you would expect. onstad doesn't miss the little things.

name: rayonatoilet
text: Oh GOD I didn't even notice that. I never knew there could be a little detail that little.

name: landowmpg
text: Apparently neither do you.  A chubby my good man.

name: ravindra108
text:
Poor Beef... He doesn't even realize that Teodor only wears the shirt that Penny made for him , and Philippe has never accosted him for his arrogance.

Stupid depression.

name: havenless
text: A comment left by havenless was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, tttt, Connellingus, cryabetes, the_dingle, Panserbjorne, Shinkicka, dj)

name: lastlarf
text: This one's an easy five. Never fails to crack me up.

text:
Were they new shoes?

You are so ARROGANT!

name: sp1derbaby
text: Here comes an arrogant girl!

name: toast
text: A comment left by toast was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, scramblesthedog, the_dingle)

name: gormster
text: What about the "ENORMOUS By Ray Smuckles" shirt? That's about as arrogant as shirts come.

name: rosie
text: Poor Beef. This is what depression is like.

name: tapestry
text: everyone on assetbar understands?

name: mercuri0us
text: Right now, Roast Beef totally reminds me of myself.  I guess just about everyone thinks that, though.  That's what makes him such a good character.

name: tripperday
text: I've put together a really neat looking outfit at the store and just hung all the clothes back up and left the store because I know I wouldn't like right in nice things.

name: rawk5tar
text: Onstand MUST have had depression. There's no way someone without could understand this sort of rediculousnss

name: fuzzyrobot
text:
I typed part of a response before deleting it, full of shame for my arrogant self thinking I could write up a comment to an Achewood strip.

So basically my original comment was that it might be a terrible thing when you get where Beef's coming from.

name: lordparadise
text: It is the saddest thing.

name: anomalous3
text: A comment left by anomalous3 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, Voretus, aperson)

name: behka
text: oh, poor beef.

name: spinynorman
text: A comment left by spinynorman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, fancypants, the_dingle)

name: luckypyjamas
text: you are so ARROGANT

name: zefiel
text:
Molly takes all the internet detectives to school. Tracking down someone while you're in heaven is COMPLETELY RAW .

Also, The contradiction between Philippe's character and what he says in beef's mind is delightful.

name: aliiis
text:
Yes! If it were anyone but Philippe you would imagine them saying 'You are so ARROGANT!' in a kind of angry sassy voice, but because it is him I imagine him sounding just sort of hurt and let down. I am disappointed , his little raised otter arms seem to say. I thought that Roast Beef was a good man, a man (cat?) who knew the value of humility.

Teodor's reproach is similarly entertaining. This time. Teodor has reprimanded Beef in his head before.

(Also, ain't no way I am going to try typing an accented 'e' in this messed-up bbcode thing . What's wrong with html, eh?)

name: zapatos
text: I hear Philippe almost chearing him on, because I doubt that lil otter knows the meaning of the word.

name: relaxing
text: It's all about hubris, and DEFINITELY not having hubris.

name: delzhand
text: Is that pi on the back of the shirt?  Because that would make it even more awesome, 'specially for Beef.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: A comment left by dropkickpikachu was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fancypants, cryabetes, Voretus)

name: killerlimpet
text: I had the same problem a few years back with Dilbert's shirt. Your assesment is correct.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Crowpaw, PresterJohn, tttt2, DougTheHead, Lumus, Crater12, STUART)

name: killerlimpet
text: I *read* Dilbert *a few years back*

name: dovey
text: You got a chubby for "silly cockchops"

text: A comment left by tttt2 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fancypants, Scorpio_nadir, nipsy43, ford)

text: You're gonna get a lame for laming 'silly cockchops'

text: you get a lame for laming someone who lamed for chubbying 'silly cockchops'

text:
I like cheese!
There. Chain broken. Let's move along.

name: semiquaver
text: Dilbert is hella terrible.

name: tekende
text: It was not always thus.

name: semiquaver
text: No, that's true.  Once...it was...OKAY.

name: deusoma
text: "blammed"?

name: anticitizen
text: twenty five XP for "cockchops"

name: relaxing
text: wow do NOT mention back pleats on assetbar.

name: factorial
text: A comment left by factorial was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by featurelessvoid, VeniVidiEffluxi, PresterJohn, mortshire, spicyponyhead, TheQuietYou, Darthemed)

name: evolume
text: A comment left by evolume was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fancypants, lauralou, Attack_Wombat)

name: dovey
text: pleat?

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
I am thoroughly digging the combination of your avatar and comment.

Beef looks so excited about a pleat that he can't even believe it.

name: aliiis
text: chubbied for pointing this out, thank you! It made me do a face like in my own avatar.

name: zapatos
text: What an endearing grin!

name: mrcool1122
text: I always do this when I go shopping in stores. I end up getting clothes from Goodwill so no one will think I am pompous.

name: biddlebubbly
text:
Then they just think you're being pretentious/ironic instead. There ain't no winning.

This is why I can't wear my awesome eraserhead shirt.

name: stuart
text: If somebody lays into your Eraserhead shirt, start just basically acting like Nice Pete. Tilt your head and let out a really long shriek. Perhaps start pushing the nearest object with your face.

name: boredom_man
text: Works even better with men-size 13 purple pumps.

name: catgrl131
text: BUT THOSE MAKE YOU LOOK CHEAP, MISTER DRACULA!

name: boredom_man
text: YOU KNOW I NEED SPECIAL PUMPS TO BE OUT IN SOCIETY

name: craigola
text: Poor Beef. I have owned, and worn, many shirts that were far worse than that one.

name: shmuckeles
text: man, even phillipe rags on beef in his imagination! who hasn't been there? people with genuine self-esteem i guess

name: darthemed
text: Lyle isn't there, because Beef is afraid of what his paranoid depression would turn the already harsh Lyle into. That's my guess, at least.

name: farqussus
text: I don't remember writing this. Oh, I didn't.

name: heccibiggs
text: Man, I always get you guys with your Nice Pete murder icon avatars mixed up. How many of you are there?

name: farqussus
text: i think three.

name: farqussus
text: I changed!

name: heccibiggs
text: Zebedee!

name: chaesar
text: I own this color strip, it hangs on my wall, because it pretty much defines my teen years. Also, my lady bought it for me, because she knows this, which is also rad.

name: aarongstock
text: Who do you think you are, putting on such airs!

name: omegatron
text: This strip should be on a shirt.

name: sherwood
text: Truly, all of Beef's depression strips are right on.  The one where he can't go to the grocery store is achingly brilliant.

name: idiot_circus
text: *you get points for using the word "achingly"*

name: nurdbot
text: Poor Beef, his crippling anxieties and depressions even pursuade him that Phillipe would say such a thing.

name: plezure
text: Beef's shirt is from Pier I

name: vic_acid
text: It looks like Beefs a nailbiter as well.

name: tombsgrave
text: That the only logical conclusion is that he bury the shirt makes the strip.  A quintessential Roast Beef moment.

name: epicurus
text: An easy five. This one is really, really, really good. It is good that someone made a comic like this.

name: plutor
text: When I finally get a signed copy of a strip, it will be this one.

name: evolume
text: This happens to me except I picked out the shirt and already paid for it and already lost the receipt.

name: agentstinky
text: I always laugh at this one but at the same time I feel really really bad for Roast Beef.

name: nonorganon
text: It says as much about Roast Beefs character when he buttons the top button on a polo as the castigation does.

name: factorial
text: Look at you in that new shirt! Hahaha the best part.

name: chris_ess
text: I totally understand this, Someone buys you clothes because they think you will look good in them, but you think they are different from you. so you are scared people will notice that and cast aspersions...

name: zapatos
text: My Mother gifts me with ROOTS clothing, usually with a plethora of maple leaves and beavers.  I wear them when we have family gatherings, which I believe misleads her into buying more.  Damn.

name: tekende
text: We don't want to know about your mom's beavers.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Speak for yourself.  I got beaver fever!

name: belgand
text: I think that can be easily cleared up with some of the more popular antibiotics these days. Please do not resort to utilizing a fumigation of mercury. While it will doubtless fill the rest of us with amusement it will likely not ameliorate your condition.

name: zapatos
text:
My mom shaves anyhow.

What?

name: belgand
text: I implied that fineoakstructure had contracted syphilis from having relations with one of yours. I advised him not to seek a no longer popular treatment for this illness as it is largely curable by other methods.

name: zapatos
text: No I understood your point.  The comment was for FOS.

name: steerpike66
text: I am so like this sometimes. All imagining my own angry accusations coming out of the mouths of my friends.

name: omegatron
text: I would so be like this.  All imagining my own angry accusations coming out of the mouths of my friends... If I had friends.

name: alessandro
text: i've actually had this feeling on several occasions...same with his grocery store problem

name: redmad
text: I've never empathized with a character as much as this.

name: plusigot125
text: This strip elicits from me tears of empathy and self-recognition.

name: wae
text: he could have used it as sort of a make-shift nervousness blanket

name: talix18
text: Again I am confused.  Does the degree to which I ache for Beef indicate that I must give the strip a five?  Despite the pain it evokes?  Because of the pain?  Oh man I don't know about this

name: stuart
text:
Look at you in that new 5!
How could you BE so cocky?!

name: deusoma
text: She really blew it this time!

name: skiddyfisk
text: It takes a unique lady to love a fellow who buries her presents in the yard

name: vreeeee
text: Especially because he's a cat and not a dog.

name: shemmjacc
text: This is how I feel when buying new clothes 90% of the time

name: shemmjacc
text: dang I meant to make that comment pro

name: nicolae
text: no beef no WEAR IT OUT LOUD

name: jonnay
text: I mean, besides the obvious hilarity of Beef burying a shirt, Philipe's imagined anger is what really gets me.

name: jimjams
text: That actually happened to me once. But I didn't let it get me down. Just took ma pills and went on ma way.

name: saint
text: even phillipe can see the arrogance of owning a new shirt!

name: rad_chillies
text: One of my personal favorites.  This is exactly how I feel when I get new clothes.  There must be something wrong with us (Beef and I) if we can't wear new clothes without feeling like douche bags.

name: catgrl131
text: I second that crippling, dehumanizing emotion.

name: takepills
text: aw poor beef

name: crev_gibax
text: This is the most disheartening thing I have ever read.

name: nabeel84
text: Only Beef could imagine Philippe angry.

name: mrklaw
text: Roast Beef is the guy who sucks.

name: kharitonov
text: Plus he got depression.

name: weapon86
text: Does Roast Beef bite his nails too? He never mentions this, but I guess it would be like mentioning you left a gaseous ghost on the elevator.

name: hazelfo
text: This is of course what I do with all of my arrogant clothes.

name: avenuehebrew
text: This is basically what goes on in my life.

name: crankheart
text: i WISH it were pi on the back of his shirt. i think i'll go make me one. yarp.

name: hbaranov
text: I wonder if Roast Beef has ever been asked by Molly since they moved in with each other 'Where is that nice shirt I sent you?'

name: tekende
text:
"Oh uh it must have gotten lost in the mail you know those postal workers ain't too good at getting things to a place

No they ain't too good at all"

name: bowandarrow
text: this got a 4, mainly because of Lil P's " You are so ARROGANT! "

name: mangtastic
text: Only a four???

name: thegoodwillgirl
text:
I brought cake and lemonade for the party, but no one else came, so I cried.

The end.

name: rowboat
text: I'm here. We are so lame.

name: tripleg
text: thank god i'm not the only one...

name: catgrl131
text:
Hey guys!

I brought balloons!
They have Elmo on them!

name: pogo
text: Blow me ... I mean, I'll blow up one of those Elmo balloons.

name: catgrl131
text: Pogo! You made it! How was the traffic? Here, have some delicious lemonade!

name: tripleg
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: pogo
text: A scene from Pogo's youth inthe '50s.

name: fineoakstructure
text: He's second from the left, in the purple

name: omegatron
text:
Second from the left is in white.

I'd post a picture of a left and right hand held up so that the thumb and forefinger of the left hand form an "L", but I can't find one with Google Image Search.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Listen: do you know how drunk I am most times I post on here?

The answer is: sorta, some of the time. Let's just assume this was one of those times.

name: pogo
text: Word up, we are from the future, 10/8/08 or so, a lame weekend stuck with a strip for days, so someone, maybe I_hate_kate, said let's party back in 2/18/04.

name: thegoodwillgirl
text:
And then he blew off his own party!

pssht. whatev!

name: tripleg
text: he's missing pogo's sexy youth

name: rumblefish
text:
I stopped reading Achewood for a while after this strip. It made me sad that Beef never seemed to be allowed any happiness.
2004 was an odd year.

name: rowen
text: I kind of hear their voices as Roast Beef imitating how I usually hear their voices.  His Phillipe probably the best.

name: conorkampbell
text:
Who sends a shirt with a symbol of pie on the back of it?

I mean, REALLY.

name: carlyle
text: Molly Ringwald does. She knows Beef well.

name: genequagmire
text: I felt like this in high school.

name: carlyle
text: He reall blew it that time!

name: srikamaraja
text: Wearing a shirt is hard when you are from Circumstances.

name: greenkoolayd
text:
'member, guys:

we. are. all. rad.

name: litfanbreastman
text: I have this experience whenever I try to wear a buttoned shirt on a non-special occasion.

name: phantomsword
text: Molly, Molly, Molly... Hmmm. Ain't she dead?

name: rowboat
text: Read more.

name: sherief
text: No, Charlie Brown is dead.
